com.airomo.sdk

Class AiromoSDKConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.airomo.sdk.AiromoSDKConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.airomo.sdk.service.IAiromoSDKServiceCallback

    public class AiromoSDKConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.airomo.sdk.service.IAiromoSDKServiceCallback
    Airomo SDK Service connector object. This object should be a part of your activity on order to manage Airomo SDK service lifetime, bind to Airomo SDK service and interact with Airomo Cloud Service. It's highle recommended to call AiromoSDKConnector.onStart() on your activity onStart() and AiromoSDKConnector.onStop() in your activity onStop() methods to let connector to correctly manage Airomo SDK Service lifetime and binding resources. onServerError should be overridden to display possible errors to user. There are two main usage scenarios: 1. Use com.airomo.sdk.parcel.RequestParcel inherited objects to interact with server through sendRequestToServer and onServerResponse methods. 2. Use method calls with IServerResponseCallback callbacks to receive server responses. Both scenarios are equally useful and you can mix them.
    Author:
    Dennis Gubsky

        callback - the IServerResponseCallback callback to be called when correct server response received. If null, then response will be returned on onServerReponse

        in - case of status or server error

      • onServerReponse

        public void onServerReponse(RequestParcel parcel)
        UI-synchronized callback called when request received for the parcel just sent. If you sent multiple parcels then exact parcel may be distinguished by RequestParcel.getUID() call. Parcel class is available through RequestParcel.getParcelClassName()
        Parameters:
        parcel - received parcel

      • replyReceived

        public void replyReceived(RequestParcel parcel)
        Called by AiromoSDKService when new reply received from server. This method called asynchronously Do not override or make sure super.replyReceived(parcel) called first.
        Specified by:
        replyReceived in interface com.airomo.sdk.service.IAiromoSDKServiceCallback
        Parameters:
        parcel - containing request and received server response

      • loginToAiromoServer

        public void loginToAiromoServer(com.airomo.sdk.Constants.ACCOUNT_TYPE accountType,
                       java.lang.String email,
                       java.lang.String login,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String accessToken)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Login to Airomo server using. If accountType == AIROMO, then email or login and password should be passed; If accountType == FACEBOK or GOOGLE, them accessToken should be passed when login process completed the loginStatusChanged callback will be called.
        Parameters:
        accountType - login account type (AIROMO, FACEBOOK or GOOGLE)
        email - user email for AIROMO login
        login - user login for AIROMO login
        password - AIROMO login password
        accessToken - OAuth access token for FACEBOOK and GOOGLE logins
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • signupAndLoginToAiromoServer

        public void signupAndLoginToAiromoServer(com.airomo.sdk.Constants.ACCOUNT_TYPE accountType,
                                java.lang.String userName,
                                java.lang.String email,
                                java.lang.String login,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String accessToken)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Sign-up (create new account) on Airomo server and login to Airomo server. If accountType == AIROMO, then email or login and password should be passed; If accountType == FACEBOK or GOOGLE, them accessToken should be passed when login process completed the loginStatusChanged callback will be called.
        Parameters:
        accountType - login account type (AIROMO, FACEBOOK or GOOGLE)
        email - user email for AIROMO login
        login - user login for AIROMO login
        password - AIROMO login password
        accessToken - OAuth access token for FACEBOOK and GOOGLE logins
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • renewThirdPartyLoginToken

        public void renewThirdPartyLoginToken(com.airomo.sdk.Constants.ACCOUNT_TYPE accountType,
                             java.lang.String accountName,
                             java.lang.String accessToken,
                             android.os.Handler.Callback tokenAquiredCallback)
        Called by AiromoSDKService when Airomo login token expired and service needs new third-party token (Facebook or Google) to renew the Airomo login token. Returns last used accessToken by default.
        Specified by:
        renewThirdPartyLoginToken in interface com.airomo.sdk.service.IAiromoSDKServiceCallback
        Parameters:
        accountType - current account type (Facebook or Google).
        accountName - third-party account name (email for Google account)
        accessToken - old access token
        tokenAquiredCallback - callback to be called when new token acquired

      • loginStatusChanged

        public void loginStatusChanged(com.airomo.sdk.Constants.ACCOUNT_TYPE accountType,
                      boolean loggedIn,
                      java.lang.String login,
                      java.lang.String airomoUserAccessToken)
        Called by AiromoSDKService when user login status is changed Override this to be notified when user is really logged in (this takes some time). While user is not logged in none of your calls except Appcurl will reach the server. This callback will be called when user is logged in by calling loginToAiromoServer, signinAndLoginToAiromoServer and logoutAiromoServer. Also this may be called if Airomo user token expired and AiromoSDKServer unable to reestablish login because of expired third-party (Facebook or Google) access token.
        Specified by:
        loginStatusChanged in interface com.airomo.sdk.service.IAiromoSDKServiceCallback
        Parameters:
        accountType - current account type (Facebook or Google).
        loggedIn - true if user logged in and false if user is not logged in
        login - optional user login or email
        airomoUserAccessToken - unique permanent access token assigned to this user

      • searchApplications

        public void searchApplications(android.os.Bundle filter,
                      java.lang.String order,
                      int page,
                      int pageSize,
                      AiromoSDKConnector.IServerResponseCallback callback)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Search applications by given filter parameters on Appcurl API.
        Parameters:
        filter - Bundle containing non-mandatory filtering parameters: Optional parameters: Name Description/Comment default q Search keywords (listing in case q not specified) platforms[] Filter by platform IDs // comma separated string list of platform ids all stores[] Filter by stores IDs // comma separated string list of stores ids all categories[] Filter by category IDs // comma separated string list of category ids all price[] Filter by price (free/paid) // comma separated string list of prices all rating[] Filter by rating / by ratings range // comma separated string list of ratings all tags[] Filter by tags // comma separated string list of tags all(without filters)
        order - of applications in respose (for example "aplha+asc"): type description default order alpha by application name asc rating by star rating desc pi by popularity index desc score by relevance desc pdate by publish date (newest/oldest) desc lta by "last time acted" (river order) desc
        page - number in sequence starting from 1
        pageSize - number of record in one page
        callback - to be called when response received from server
        Throws:
        in - case of status or server error
        java.lang.Exception

      • quickSearchApplications

        public void quickSearchApplications(java.lang.String query,
                           int size,
                           java.lang.String platforms,
                           AiromoSDKConnector.IServerResponseCallback callback)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Quick search applications by template to fill auto-complete edit hints list
        Parameters:
        query - Search query (3 chars min)
        size - number of apps in response (default is 10)
        platforms - Filter by platform IDs // comma separated string list of platform ids
        callback - to be called when response received from server
        Throws:
        in - case of status or server error
        java.lang.Exception

      • searchApplications

        public void searchApplications(int partnerId,
                      int channelId,
                      android.os.Bundle optionalProperties,
                      android.os.Bundle filter,
                      int offset,
                      int size,
                      AiromoSDKConnector.IServerResponseCallback callback)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Search applications using given filtering options.
        Sample JSON response format:


        {
        "results": [
        {
        "id": 49587,
        "nativeUrl": "https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rovio.angrybirds",
        "title": "Angry Birds",
        "icon": "https://lh6.ggpht.com/M9q_Zs_CRt2rbA41nTMhrPqiBxhUEUN8Z1f_mn9m89_TiHbIbUF8hjnc_zwevvLsRIJy=w300",
        "platform": 2,
        "store": 2,
        "category": [
        33,
        31,
        6
        ],
        "price": "0.00",
        "pi": 5.504146192248184,
        "totalReview": 0,
        "rating": 4.5848517,
        "screenshots": [
        "https://lh6.ggpht.com/Tr_WN4XUGEzb2zMVl2HgyL70Sze53Uuyg6jCXQCNqKDfVZtyqH8Zur8D_iswmviLvQ7L=h310",
        "https://lh3.ggpht.com/rlvJySJbKr5Ot1nVCAUwKyE118n3vt5Aaugani4BfDuuHh60P69JzltC0k18xWk610GZ=h310",
        ],
        "videos": [
        "https://www.youtube.com/embed/BNb62NBYvGU",
        "ps=play&vq=large&rel=0&autohide=1&showinfo=0&autoplay=1"
        ],
        "description": "The survival of the Angry Birds is at stake. Dish out revenge on the greedy pigs who stole their eggs. Use the unique powers of each bird to destroy the pigs’ defenses. Angry Birds features challenging physics-based gameplay and hours of replay value. Each level requires logic, skill, and force to solve.If you get stuck in the game, you can purchase the Mighty Eagle! Mighty Eagle is a one-time in-app purchase in Angry Birds that gives unlimited use. This phenomenal creature will soar from the skies to wreak havoc and smash the pesky pigs into oblivion. There’s just one catch: you can only use the aid of Mighty Eagle to pass a level once per hour. Mighty Eagle also includes all new gameplay goals and achievements!In addition to the Mighty Eagle, Angry Birds now has power-ups! Boost your birds’ abilities and three-star levels to unlock secret content! Angry Birds now has the following amazing power-ups: Sling Scope for laser targeting, King Sling for maximum flinging power, Super Seeds to supersize your birds, and Birdquake to shake pigs’ defenses to the ground!What is new in version 3.2.0:The #1 app of all time gets a fun new update! You may be an expert pig popper, but how will you cope with a moving target? One bird stands between the egg and the advancing pig army in the all-new Red’s Mighty Feathers episode. The fearless Red Bird faces wave after wave of Bad Piggies in their crazy contraptions. But wait! He now has some magic feathers from the Mighty Eagle himself – giving Red incredible new powers as he darts toward those pesky pigs at incredible speed!Fun new gameplay – the Egg Defender mode gives Red special powers to attack the advancing pigs!15 new levels – the latest Red’s Mighty Feathers episode brings fresh new challenges!72 crazy pig contraptions – wave after wave of Bad Piggies edging closer in their wacky machines!Rovio Account for Android – pick up your game where you left off across multiple devices!Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyThis free version of Angry Birds contains third party advertisements. Please see our privacy policy for additional information.This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply.Important Message for ParentsThis game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.",
        "sponsored" :false
        },
        . . .
        ],
        "collation": "angry bird",
        "searchToken":"45698889ACDF232DCAA23",
        "total": 581
        }

        Parameters:
        partnerId - Product identifier, to track when a client has more than one product
        channelId - Analytics Filter, to track multiple logical channels of analytics data
        optionalProperties - RESERVED FOR FUTURE: To address additional analytics properties
        filter - Bundle containing one or more of the following parameters: url: Search URL (use FILTER_URL constant)
        metaKeywords: String (comma-separated list of keywords) Meta keywords from target page. Can be used together with URL parameter to increase results relevance. (use FILTER_META_KEYWORDS constant)
        query: Search keywords (use FILTER_QUERY constant)
        platform: int [] : 1/2, default - all, Filter by application platform. (use FILTER_PLATFORM constant)
        1 - iOS application, Use com.airomo.sdk.common.Platforms.iOS#ordinal()
        2 - Android application, Use com.airomo.sdk.common.Platforms.Android#ordinal()
        by default - all platforms
        store: int []: 1/2/3/4 default - all. Filter by application origin store. (use FILTER_STORE constant)
        1 - iTunes AppStore( for iOS apps). Use com.airomo.sdk.common.SoftwareMarkets.iTunes#ordinal();
        2 - Google Play(for Android apps). Use com.airomo.sdk.common.SoftwareMarkets.GooglePlay#ordinal();
        3 - Amazon App Store(for Android apps). Use com.airomo.sdk.common.SoftwareMarkets.Amazon#ordinal();
        4 - Nook App Store(for Android apps). Use com.airomo.sdk.common.SoftwareMarkets.Nook#.ordinal();
        by default - all stores
        price: String enum : "free"/"paid", default - all. Filtering by Free/Paid applications. (use FILTER_PRICE option with one of FILTER_PRICE_FREE or com.airomo.sdk.AiromoSDKConnector#FILTER_PRICE_PAIND values)
        categories: int []. default - all. List of category Ids for filtering. Use getCategories(IServerResponseCallback) method to get category list with names. (use FILTER_CATEGORIES constant)
        tags: String []. List of tags like "sport", "soccer". (use FILTER_TAGS constant)
        offset: - integer >=0, default = 0, Offset
        size: - Page size, integer, [0 - 100], default = 10, Number of results per request
        callback - to be called when response received from server
        Throws:
        in - case of status or server error
        java.lang.Exception

      • searchApplicationClick

        public void searchApplicationClick(int partnerId,
                          int channelId,
                          android.os.Bundle optionalProperties,
                          java.lang.String appId,
                          java.lang.String searchToken,
                          AiromoSDKConnector.IServerResponseCallback callback)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Report application clicked UI user event for analytics and targeting
        Parameters:
        partnerId - Product identifier, to track when a client has more than one product
        channelId - Analytics Filter, to track multiple logical channels of analytics data
        optionalProperties - RESERVED FOR FUTURE: To address additional analytics properties
        appId - Application id which was clicked
        searchToken - Search token - for user tracking. Take this value from searchApplications2 JSON response.
        Throws:
        in - case of status or server error
        java.lang.Exception
